name: Elitest Ones
description:
In this game you are an entry level employee in Bullet CO. trying to climb up the corporate ladder. The way you move up in this company is to beat them at their own game. You have to fight your way through your competitors to make way to the boss. After reaching them, you have to beat them to take their lofty throne.

This is a group project that we started and completed in 3 weeks. I was the lead gameplay programmer. Conner Wieczorek was our artist. Jake Oaks was our composer. Hunter Shields was our UI designer.
